.page-content

Welcome to Cooper Colony Golf Course, a family-owned and operated oasis nestled in the heart of Cooper City, Florida.
OUR STORY
Welcome to Cooper Colony Golf Course, a family-owned and operated oasis nestled in the heart of Cooper City, Florida. With a rich history spanning several decades, our establishment has become a cherished home away from home for golfers of all levels and experiences.
At Cooper Colony Golf Course, we pride ourselves on providing an exceptional golfing experience coupled with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or a novice looking to improve your swing, our 18-hole par 60 executive course offers a challenge for everyone. Our lush fairways and meticulously maintained greens provide the perfect backdrop for an enjoyable round of golf.
As a family-owned business, we understand the importance of creating a sense of community and fostering lasting relationships. Our knowledgeable and friendly staff is always ready to greet you with a smile, ensuring that your visit to Cooper Colony Golf Course is nothing short of exceptional. From the moment you step foot on our grounds, you’ll feel like part of our extended family.
WHAT WE OFFER
Beyond the golf course, Cooper Colony offers a range of amenities to enhance your experience. We offer two chipping areas, two putting zones, and a lighted range for nighttime practice. If you’re looking to improve your skills, our PGA-certified instructors offer private and group lessons tailored to your specific needs. Our Pro-Shop has all your essential needs for a full day of golfing, be it by yourself or with a group of friends.
After a satisfying round of golf, unwind at our clubhouse, where you can indulge in delicious food and refreshing beverages. Our on-site restaurant offers a diverse menu featuring mouthwatering dishes crafted with care. Whether you’re grabbing a quick bite or enjoying a leisurely meal with friends, our culinary offerings are sure to satisfy any palate.
Cooper Colony Golf Course is more than just a golfing destination—it’s a place where memories are made, friendships are forged, and a love for the game is nurtured. We invite you to join our golfing family and experience the warmth, camaraderie, and exceptional golf that have made us a beloved institution in Cooper City, Florida. Come tee off with us and discover the magic of Cooper Colony Golf Course.
